Otto von Bismarck不仅铁腕，而且心机深重。1854年，他得知俄国正在撤回驻法国大使，意味着法国即将对俄宣战。他在日记中思索着如何利用这个消息来恐吓某人，突然发现梅耶·罗斯柴尔德就坐在门口。于是，他向梅耶透露了这一消息。然后，他兴致勃勃地观察梅耶的脸色，看到他惊恐地变得苍白，随后小声地说：“如果我早知道，我就可以及时抛售债券了。”

步骤：1. 洗净土豆去皮，切片放入锅中煮熟，压成土豆泥。2. 用磨碾机将洋葱磨成茸备用。3. 将土豆泥中加入淡奶油、盐、黑胡椒粉、虾肉、青豆和少许白糖，彻底搅拌均匀。4. 将混合土豆泥装入烤盒内。5. 将芝士条均匀铺在表面，放入预热至180度的烤箱中烤约20分钟即可。

Softstem leaves soup is incredibly healing. The leaves are fleshy and glossy, crisp and smooth, reminiscent of a cross between spinach and okra, just right in every way. Sprinkle in a couple of Sichuan peppercorns, preferably the mature and fragrant Da Hong Pao variety, with its mellow numbing sensation spreading in the boiling water, eliminating the slight bitterness of the leaves while amplifying and prolonging their natural sweetness. The taste of softstem leaves is so comfortable that one would want to remember it for a lifetime. The soup is also praiseworthy, drinking it will make you break into a slight sweat, dissipating all uncertainties along with it.

Water Hole Gorge Ostrich Park is set to open in April. Over 30,000 years ago, ostriches were already breeding in Water Hole Gorge. The ancestors of Water Hole Gorge used ostrich eggshell ornaments, which were the earliest decorations produced in Asia. Visitors can not only observe and get close to ostriches up close, but children can also ride ostriches and roam around the Red Willow Beach in Water Hole Gorge.

Today is the traditional Chinese festival of "Lichun". According to folklore, the practice of "avoiding the spring" in 2012 is specifically aimed at individuals born in the Year of the Dog, Rabbit, or Dragon, and those who are particularly sensitive to water in terms of fortune telling. It is advised that before the "You" period after Lichun, these individuals should leave their homes and ideally stay at least a hundred miles away to avoid the influence and harm of the Tai Sui for the year. When avoiding the spring today, it is especially important to note that the northeast direction is the best choice, followed by the southwest. It is also recommended to seek blessings by climbing mountains or high places. Spring, where are you hiding? Come out quickly!

After the Chinese New Year, spring arrives! Come to Jiayang, Sichuan, and take a ride on a small steam train! It runs in a small county in southern Sichuan - 15 kilometers north of Jianwei County, covering a distance of only 19.84 kilometers. With the sound of "Choo-choo" echoing, the train chugs along the narrow tracks at a speed of 20 kilometers per hour, allowing passengers to leisurely enjoy the vast fields of rapeseed flowers outside the window. The most beautiful time here is in April every year!

今天小西向大家推荐了一道西江特色菜品 - 井冈山老冬笋。这道菜的原料是来自深山老林中尚未出土的冬笋，经过农家篝火熏制而成，因此也被称为烟笋。经过传统的赣味农家烹制手法精心调理后，这道菜的口感香脆美味，且笋的味道持久悠长！浓郁的赣乡风情瞬间围绕着你！那种味道，让人回味无穷，小西情不自禁地写了一首诗，希望大家喜欢！
每天早上我走进小房间，第一件事就是和第一个见到的宝贝分享一个“早安之吻”。今天是安安，亲完之后还给了我一个拥抱！我想我们彼此的内心都充满了满足和快乐。以前我总是想，何时才能在工作中感受快乐呢？原来拥有了最纯真最基本的爱——来自孩子的爱比任何事都重要！希望每位朋友每天都能过得满足快乐！
昨天犯了一个错误，老婆今天已经发现了。在这里真诚地向老婆道歉，并承诺从现在开始改正我的过失。从高三到现在已经有七年多的时间，这段旅程中还包括三年多的异地恋。正是因为彼此的信任、理解和坦诚，我们才能一起走过过去，继续向前，直至永远。
